data.title: Thank you to our reviewers
data.meta_description: An open access rheumatology journal publishing research on rheumatic and musculoskeletal disorders and connective tissue diseases. An official journal of EULAR.
data.meta_site_name: RMD Open | A leading rheumatology journal from EULAR & BMJ
data.text:
The editors would like to publicly acknowledge the people listed below who served as reviewers for the journal during 2023. Without their efforts, the quality of the journal could not be sustained. Special thanks are given to the mentors and mentees that participated in the EMEUNET reviewer mentoring programme.
